author: eptwts
text:
it's really not that hard to make money online...

start a faceless tiktok page around a common, but painful insecurity (finance, dating, appearance, health, etc.)

build an email list of people with this insecurity in which you drop sauce on how to resolve it

create an offer that helps them resolve it (course, PDF, dwy service, etc.)

set up a landing page with good DR copy

launch the offer to your email list, monitor conversions, adjust pricing/copy, and so on...

there is literally ZERO sauce here, this is super basic stuff

but it's literally all you need to do to get to +/- $10k/month

don't even try any other online biz model until you succeed in doing this, this is level 0
